trans-unit.source: Provides the extensible Application Markup Language (XAML) serialization services to workflows at design time.
trans-unit.target: Fornece os serviços de serialização extensible Application Markup Language (XAML) para fluxos de trabalho em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] WorkflowMarkupSerializer provides methods that serialize workflow and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> classes into XAML format and deserialize XAML content into workflow and activity class objects.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]WorkflowMarkupSerializer fornece métodos que serializa o fluxo de trabalho e <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>classes em XAML de formato e desserializar o conteúdo XAML em objetos de classe de fluxo de trabalho e atividades.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>

trans-unit.source: These services are primarily used by workflow designers to persist the classes on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Esses serviços são usados principalmente por designers de fluxo de trabalho para manter as classes na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: WorkflowMarkupSerializer is the base class for all markup serializers included in the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization> namespace.
trans-unit.target: WorkflowMarkupSerializer é a classe base para todos os serializadores de marcação incluídos no <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization>namespace.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Serialization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [serialização](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: WorkflowMarkupSerializer does not support serialization of nested types.
trans-unit.target: WorkflowMarkupSerializer não oferece suporte à serialização de tipos aninhados.

trans-unit.source: The functionality of WorkflowMarkupSerializer is dependent on functionality of other types outside of Windows Workflow Foundation.
trans-unit.target: A funcionalidade de WorkflowMarkupSerializer depende da funcionalidade de outros tipos de fora do Windows Workflow Foundation.

trans-unit.source: Based on the limitations of those other types, not all data types can be serialized through the WorkflowMarkupSerializer.
trans-unit.target: Com base nas limitações desses outros tipos, nem todos os tipos de dados podem ser serializados por meio de WorkflowMarkupSerializer.

trans-unit.source: The following is a list is an example of some unsupported types.
trans-unit.target: A seguir está que uma lista é um exemplo de alguns tipos sem suporte.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This is not an exhaustive and complete list of unsupported types.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Isso não é uma lista exaustiva e completa de tipos incompatíveis.

trans-unit.source: Arrays (supported only if property is not decorated with `DesignerSerializationVisibility.Content` attribute value) Types without parameterless constructors Multidimensional Arrays Generic types (Generic `List` and `Dictionary` types supported only if property is decorated with `DesignerSerializationVisibility.Content` attribute value) `Hashtable` `Queue` `Stack` `XmlDocument` `MailMessage` `Bitmap` Enumeration Arrays Enumerations decorated with the FlagsAttribute In addition to this list, any property decorated with both the `ContentPropertyAttibute` and the `DesignerSerializationVisibilityAttribute` cannot be serialized by `WorkflowMarkupSerializer`.
trans-unit.target: Matrizes (com suporte apenas se a propriedade não é decorada com `DesignerSerializationVisibility.Content` valor do atributo) tipos sem construtores sem parâmetros tipos genéricos de matrizes multidimensionais (genérico `List` e `Dictionary` tipos com suporte apenas se a propriedade é decorada com `DesignerSerializationVisibility.Content` valor do atributo) `Hashtable` `Queue` `Stack` `XmlDocument` `MailMessage` `Bitmap` enumerações de matrizes de enumeração decorados com o FlagsAttribute além dessa lista, qualquer propriedade decorada com ambos o `ContentPropertyAttibute` e o `DesignerSerializationVisibilityAttribute` não pode ser serializado por `WorkflowMarkupSerializer`.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Adds a child object to the specified object.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um objeto filho para o objeto especificado.

trans-unit.source: Other than exception behavior, AddChild provides no default behavior.
trans-unit.target: Diferente de comportamento de exceção AddChild não fornece nenhum comportamento padrão.

trans-unit.source: You must override <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer> to provide logic for this method in an inheriting serializer.
trans-unit.target: Você deve substituir <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer>para fornecer a lógica para este método em um serializador de herança.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"></xref> to use in this operation.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"> </xref> a ser usado nesta operação.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to which to add the child object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Object>ao qual adicionar o objeto filho.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to add.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Object>ser adicionado.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: parentObject or childObj contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: parentObjectou childObj contém uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Returns a Boolean that indicates whether the specified object can be serialized to a string.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um valor booleano que indica se o objeto especificado pode ser serializado em uma cadeia de caracteres.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"></xref> used to serialize this object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"> </xref> usado para serializar a este objeto.

trans-unit.source: The specified <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object> Especificado

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified object can be serialized to a string; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o objeto especificado pode ser serializado em uma cadeia de caracteres; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: value is a null reference ().
trans-unit.target: valueé uma referência nula ().

trans-unit.source: Removes all child objects from the specified object.
trans-unit.target: Remove todos os objetos filho do objeto especificado.

trans-unit.source: Other than exception behavior, ClearChildren provides no default behavior.
trans-unit.target: Diferente de comportamento de exceção ClearChildren não fornece nenhum comportamento padrão.

trans-unit.source: You must override <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer> to provide logic for this method in an inheriting serializer.
trans-unit.target: Você deve substituir <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer>para fornecer a lógica para este método em um serializador de herança.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"></xref> supporting this operation.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"> </xref> suporte a esta operação.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> from which to remove all child objects.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Object>do qual remover todos os objetos filho.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: obj is a null reference ().
trans-unit.target: objé uma referência nula ().

trans-unit.source: Represents an attached <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> that is used to define which assemblies to reference for custom activities.
trans-unit.target: Representa um anexado <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"> </xref> que é usado para definir quais assemblies de referência para atividades personalizadas.

trans-unit.source: For more information about this dependency property, see [Using Workflow Markup](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/e2693a12-640b-4ccb-8fb0-db3075e94aa4).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre essa propriedade de dependência, consulte [marcação de fluxo de trabalho usando](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/e2693a12-640b-4ccb-8fb0-db3075e94aa4).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the specified <xref:System.Type> using the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma instância especificada <xref:System.Type>usando especificado <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"> </xref>.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: CreateInstance uses the type constructor that best matches the specified parameter.
trans-unit.target: CreateInstance usa o construtor de tipo que melhor descreva o parâmetro especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"></xref> supporting this operation.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"> </xref> suporte a esta operação.

trans-unit.source: The specified <xref:System.Type>
trans-unit.target: Especificado<xref:System.Type></xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: An instance of the specified <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância de <xref:System.Type>.</xref:System.Type> especificado

trans-unit.source: type is a null reference ().
trans-unit.target: typeé uma referência nula ().

trans-unit.source: Deserializes workflow markup into an <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: Desserializa a marcação de fluxo de trabalho em um <xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: For more information about workflow markup, see [Using Workflow Markup](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/e2693a12-640b-4ccb-8fb0-db3075e94aa4).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a marcação de fluxo de trabalho, consulte [marcação de fluxo de trabalho usando](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/e2693a12-640b-4ccb-8fb0-db3075e94aa4).

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> that contains the workflow definition.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>que contém a definição de fluxo de trabalho.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that contains the definition of the workflow defined in the workflow markup file or stream.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>que contém a definição do fluxo de trabalho definida no arquivo de marcação de fluxo de trabalho ou fluxo.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Deserializes workflow markup into an <xref:System.Object> using the specified serialization manager.
trans-unit.target: Desserializa a marcação de fluxo de trabalho em um <xref:System.Object>usando o Gerenciador de serialização especificada.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: For more information on workflow markup, see [Using Workflow Markup](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/e2693a12-640b-4ccb-8fb0-db3075e94aa4).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a marcação de fluxo de trabalho, consulte [marcação de fluxo de trabalho usando](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/e2693a12-640b-4ccb-8fb0-db3075e94aa4).

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager"></xref> interface, such as <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerSerializationManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que implementa o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager"> </xref> interface, como <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerSerializationManager"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> that contains the workflow definition.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>que contém a definição de fluxo de trabalho.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that contains the definition of the workflow defined in the workflow markup file or stream.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>que contém a definição do fluxo de trabalho definida no arquivo de marcação de fluxo de trabalho ou fluxo.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: reader is a null reference ().
trans-unit.target: readeré uma referência nula ().

trans-unit.source: Deserializes extensible Application Markup Language (XAML) content from the specified string according to the given type of the property to deserialize.
trans-unit.target: Desserializa o conteúdo de extensible Application Markup Language (XAML) da cadeia de caracteres especificada, conforme o tipo de dado da propriedade a ser desserializado.

trans-unit.source: `value` must meet one of the following criteria: - it is a primitive type, a string, an enumeration, or a <xref:System.TimeSpan>.
trans-unit.target: `value`deve atender a um dos seguintes critérios:-é um tipo primitivo, uma cadeia de caracteres, uma enumeração ou <xref:System.TimeSpan>.</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: - it can be assigned from the <xref:System.IConvertible> interface or from the <xref:System.Delegate> or <xref:System.Type> classes.
trans-unit.target: -ele pode ser atribuído do <xref:System.IConvertible>interface ou a <xref:System.Delegate>ou <xref:System.Type>classes.</xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Delegate> </xref:System.IConvertible>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"></xref> that manages the deserialization process.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"> </xref> que gerencia o processo de desserialização.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> associated with the property to deserialize.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>associado à propriedade a ser desserializado.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the XAML to deserialize.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém o XAML para desserializar.

trans-unit.source: The deserialized <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: Desserializado <xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: serializationManager, propertyType, or value, contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: serializationManager, propertyType, ou value, contém uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Represents an attached <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> that defines the names for event handler properties.
trans-unit.target: Representa um anexado <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"> </xref> que define os nomes de propriedades do manipulador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: This property is used only at design time, while programmatically emitting a workflow instance using the object model.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é usada somente em tempo de design, ao emitir programaticamente uma instância de fluxo de trabalho usando o modelo de objeto.

trans-unit.source: It represents XAML that references the event handler, which has not been compiled yet.
trans-unit.target: Representa o XAML que referencia o manipulador de eventos, que ainda não foi compilado.

trans-unit.source: This property contains a `Hashtable`, with event name and event handler name-value pairs.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade contém um `Hashtable`, com o nome do evento e pares de nome-valor do manipulador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: After compilation, the event property is associated directly with the handler.
trans-unit.target: Após a compilação, a propriedade de evento é associada diretamente o manipulador.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a list of child objects for the specified object
trans-unit.target: Recupera uma lista de objetos filho para o objeto especificado

trans-unit.source: Unless overridden in a class that inherits from GetChildren always returns `null` (`Nothing`).
trans-unit.target: A menos que substituída em uma classe que herda de GetChildren sempre retorna `null` (`Nothing`).

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"></xref> which supports this operation.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"> </xref> que oferece suporte a esta operação.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> from which to retrieve child objects.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Object>da qual recuperar os objetos filho.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: An that contains the child objects of obj.
trans-unit.target: Um que contém os objetos filho de obj .

trans-unit.source: obj or serializationManager contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: objou serializationManager contém uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Retrieves information about all events associated with the specified <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: Recupera informações sobre todos os eventos associados a <xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object> especificado

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"></xref> that manages the deserialization process.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"> </xref> que gerencia o processo de desserialização.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to search for event objects.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Object>para procurar objetos de evento.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: An array that contains information about the events associated with obj.
trans-unit.target: Um matriz que contém informações sobre os eventos associados ao obj .

trans-unit.source: serializationManager or obj contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: serializationManagerou obj contém uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Retrieves information about all properties associated with the specified object.
trans-unit.target: Recupera informações sobre todas as propriedades associadas ao objeto especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"></xref> that manages the serialization process.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"> </xref> que gerencia o processo de serialização.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to search for properties.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Object>para pesquisar propriedades.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: A array that contains information about the properties associated with obj.
trans-unit.target: A matriz que contém informações sobre as propriedades associadas ao obj .

trans-unit.source: serializationManager or obj contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: serializationManagerou obj contém uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Overridden.
trans-unit.target: Substituído.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer"></xref> that an object has just been deserialized.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer"> </xref> que um objeto apenas tiver sido desserializado.

trans-unit.source: OnAfterDeserialize is called immediately after the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer.Deserialize%2A> method runs.
trans-unit.target: OnAfterDeserialize é chamado imediatamente após o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer.Deserialize%2A>execuções do método.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer.Deserialize%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can override OnAfterDeserialize in a class that inherits <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer> to perform any required processing on `obj` after it has been serialized to extensible Application Markup Language (XAML).
trans-unit.target: Você pode substituir OnAfterDeserialize em uma classe que herda <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer>para executar qualquer processamento necessário `obj` depois que ele foi serializado para XAML extensible Application Markup Language ().</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer.OnAfterSerialize%2A> provides no default behavior.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer.OnAfterSerialize%2A>fornece o comportamento não padrão.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer.OnAfterSerialize%2A>

trans-unit.source: You must override it in a derived class to add any processing logic.
trans-unit.target: Você deve substituí-la em uma classe derivada para adicionar qualquer lógica de processamento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"></xref> that manages the serialization process.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"> </xref> que gerencia o processo de serialização.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> that was deserialized.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Object>que foi desserializado.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer"></xref> that an object has just been serialized.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer"> </xref> que tem um objeto apenas foi serializado.

trans-unit.source: OnAfterSerialize is called immediately after the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer.Serialize%2A> method runs.
trans-unit.target: OnAfterSerialize é chamado imediatamente após o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer.Serialize%2A>execuções do método.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer.Serialize%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can override OnAfterSerialize in a class that inherits <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer> to perform any required processing on `obj` after it has been serialized to extensible Application Markup Language (XAML).
trans-unit.target: Você pode substituir OnAfterSerialize em uma classe que herda <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer>para executar qualquer processamento necessário `obj` depois que ele foi serializado para XAML extensible Application Markup Language ().</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer>

trans-unit.source: OnAfterSerialize provides no default behavior.
trans-unit.target: OnAfterSerialize fornece um comportamento não padrão.

trans-unit.source: You must override it in a derived class to add any processing logic.
trans-unit.target: Você deve substituí-la em uma classe derivada para adicionar qualquer lógica de processamento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"></xref> that manages the serialization process.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"> </xref> que gerencia o processo de serialização.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> that was serialized.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Object>que foi serializado.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Overridden.
trans-unit.target: Substituído.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer"></xref> that an object is about to be deserialized.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer"> </xref> que um objeto está prestes a ser desserializado.

trans-unit.source: OnBeforeDeserialize is called immediately before the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer.Deserialize%2A> method runs.
trans-unit.target: OnBeforeDeserialize é chamado imediatamente antes do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer.Deserialize%2A>execuções do método.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer.Deserialize%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can override <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer.OnBeforeSerialize%2A> in a class that inherits <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer> to perform required processing on `obj` before it is serialized to extensible Application Markup Language (XAML).
trans-unit.target: Você pode substituir <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer.OnBeforeSerialize%2A>em uma classe que herda <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer>para executar o processamento necessário em `obj` antes que ele é serializado para XAML extensible Application Markup Language ().</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer.OnBeforeSerialize%2A>

trans-unit.source: OnBeforeDeserialize provides no default behavior.
trans-unit.target: OnBeforeDeserialize fornece um comportamento não padrão.

trans-unit.source: You must override it in a derived class to add any processing logic.
trans-unit.target: Você deve substituí-la em uma classe derivada para adicionar qualquer lógica de processamento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"></xref> that managed the deserialization process.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"> </xref> que gerencia o processo de desserialização.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> that was deserialized.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Object>que foi desserializado.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer"></xref> that <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer.Serialize*> is about to run.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer"> </xref> que <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer.Serialize*>está prestes a ser executado.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer.Serialize*>

trans-unit.source: OnBeforeSerialize is called immediately before the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer.Serialize%2A> method runs.
trans-unit.target: OnBeforeSerialize é chamado imediatamente antes do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer.Serialize%2A>execuções do método.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer.Serialize%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can override OnBeforeSerialize in a class that inherits <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer> to perform required processing on `obj` before it the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer.Serialize%2A> step in the serialization process has begun.
trans-unit.target: Você pode substituir OnBeforeSerialize em uma classe que herda <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer>para executar o processamento necessário em `obj` antes de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer.Serialize%2A>começou a etapa no processo de serialização.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer.Serialize%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer>

trans-unit.source: OnBeforeSerialize provides no default behavior.
trans-unit.target: OnBeforeSerialize fornece um comportamento não padrão.

trans-unit.source: You must override it in a derived class to add any processing logic.
trans-unit.target: Você deve substituí-la em uma classe derivada para adicionar qualquer lógica de processamento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"></xref> that manages the serialization process.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"> </xref> que gerencia o processo de serialização.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to be serialized.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Object>a ser serializado.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Serializes the specified <xref:System.Object> into a workflow markup file or stream.
trans-unit.target: Serializa especificado <xref:System.Object>em um arquivo de marcação de fluxo de trabalho ou fluxo.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: You must serialize either a new instance of a workflow type or the root activity in a programmatically-created workflow to create workflow markup that can be used in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.CreateWorkflow%2A> to create a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance>.
trans-unit.target: Você precisa serializar a uma nova instância de um tipo de fluxo de trabalho ou da atividade de raiz em um fluxo de trabalho criado por meio de programação para criar marcação de fluxo de trabalho que pode ser usada para <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.CreateWorkflow%2A>criar um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.CreateWorkflow%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about workflow markup, see [Using Workflow Markup](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/e2693a12-640b-4ccb-8fb0-db3075e94aa4).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a marcação de fluxo de trabalho, consulte [marcação de fluxo de trabalho usando](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/e2693a12-640b-4ccb-8fb0-db3075e94aa4).

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> that contains the stream or file used in serializing.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>que contém o fluxo ou um arquivo usado ao serializar.</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: The object to be serialized.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a ser serializado.

trans-unit.source: obj is a null reference ().
trans-unit.target: objé uma referência nula ().

trans-unit.source: Serializes the specified <xref:System.Object> into a workflow markup file or stream using the specified serialization manager.
trans-unit.target: Serializa especificado <xref:System.Object>em um arquivo de marcação de fluxo de trabalho ou fluxo usando o Gerenciador de serialização especificada.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: You must serialize either a new instance of a workflow type or the root activity in a programmatically-created workflow to create workflow markup that can be used in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.CreateWorkflow%2A> to create a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance>.
trans-unit.target: Você precisa serializar a uma nova instância de um tipo de fluxo de trabalho ou da atividade de raiz em um fluxo de trabalho criado por meio de programação para criar marcação de fluxo de trabalho que pode ser usada para <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.CreateWorkflow%2A>criar um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.CreateWorkflow%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information on workflow markup, see [Using Workflow Markup](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/e2693a12-640b-4ccb-8fb0-db3075e94aa4).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a marcação de fluxo de trabalho, consulte [marcação de fluxo de trabalho usando](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/e2693a12-640b-4ccb-8fb0-db3075e94aa4).

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager"></xref> interface, such as <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerSerializationManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que implementa o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager"> </xref> interface, como <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerSerializationManager"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> that contains the stream or file used in serializing.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>que contém o fluxo ou um arquivo usado ao serializar.</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: The object to be serialized.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a ser serializado.

trans-unit.source: obj is a null reference ().
trans-unit.target: objé uma referência nula ().

trans-unit.source: Serializes the specified <xref:System.Object> to a string.
trans-unit.target: Serializa especificado <xref:System.Object>para uma cadeia de caracteres.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Delegate> instance is assignable from `value`, SerializeToString writes the method name associated with `value` to a string.
trans-unit.target: Se um <xref:System.Delegate>instância é atribuível da `value`, SerializeToString grava o nome do método associado `value` para uma cadeia de caracteres.</xref:System.Delegate>

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Type> instance is assignable from `value`, SerializeToString writes the fully-qualified name of the type associated with `value` to a string.
trans-unit.target: Se um <xref:System.Type>instância é atribuível da `value`, SerializeToString grava o nome totalmente qualificado do tipo associado `value` para uma cadeia de caracteres.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: If neither of these conditions exist, SerializeToString converts `value` to a string and writes the result.
trans-unit.target: Se nenhuma dessas condições existirem, converte SerializeToString `value` para uma cadeia de caracteres e grava o resultado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"></xref> that manages the serialization process.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"> </xref> que gerencia o processo de serialização.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to serialize to a string.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Object>para serializar uma cadeia de caracteres.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the serialized <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém o <xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object> serializado

trans-unit.source: serializationManager or value contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: serializationManagerou value contém uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer"></xref> should serialize the specified <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer"> </xref> devem serializar especificado <xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: ShouldSerializeValue is called by <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer> before it serializes the specified object.
trans-unit.target: ShouldSerializeValue é chamado pelo <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer>antes de ele serializa o objeto especificado.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer>

trans-unit.source: The method returns `false` if `value` contains a null reference (`Nothing`) or if `value` and the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute> of the current serialization context are equal.
trans-unit.target: O método retorna `false` se `value` contém uma referência nula (`Nothing`) ou se `value` e <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute>do atual contexto de serialização são iguais.</xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute>

trans-unit.source: You can override ShouldSerializeValue in a class that inherits from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer> to customize how to determine whether the specified object should be serialized.
trans-unit.target: Você pode substituir ShouldSerializeValue em uma classe que herda de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer>para personalizar como determinar se o objeto especificado deve ser serializado.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"></xref> that manages the serialization process.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"> </xref> que gerencia o processo de serialização.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to check.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Object>para verificar.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: to indicate value should be serialized; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: para indicar value deve ser serializado; caso contrário, .

trans-unit.source: serializationManager contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: serializationManagercontém uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Represents an attached <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> that defines the type name, which will be created during compilation.
trans-unit.target: Representa um anexado <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"> </xref> que define o nome do tipo, que será criado durante a compilação.

trans-unit.source: This value corresponds to `x:Class` attribute in XAML.
trans-unit.target: Esse valor corresponde à `x:Class` atributo em XAML.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Workflow Markup](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/e2693a12-640b-4ccb-8fb0-db3075e94aa4).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [marcação de fluxo de trabalho usando](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/e2693a12-640b-4ccb-8fb0-db3075e94aa4).

trans-unit.source: This property is used only at design time.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é usada somente em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: After compilation, it becomes the name of the compiled type.
trans-unit.target: Após a compilação, ele se torna o nome do tipo compilado.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Represents a code example, embedded into XAML <xref uid="langword_csharp_x:Code" name="x:Code" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: Representa um exemplo de código inserido em XAML <xref uid="langword_csharp_x:Code" name="x:Code" href=""> </xref> elemento.

trans-unit.source: This property is used only at design time, while programmatically emitting a workflow using the object model.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é usada somente em tempo de design, ao mesmo tempo, por meio de programação emitindo um fluxo de trabalho usando o modelo de objeto.

trans-unit.source: The property contains a `CodeTypeMemberCollection` collection filled with `CodeSnippetTypeMember` elements.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade contém um `CodeTypeMemberCollection` coleção é preenchida com `CodeSnippetTypeMember` elementos.

trans-unit.source: After compilation, the code is compiled as a part of the generated type.
trans-unit.target: Após a compilação, o código é compilado como parte do tipo gerado.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.
